page.title: 13British Legion,Judo,Marnhull
page.content: The MARNHULL BRITISH LEGION began in 1921.It has about 300 members,mostly male.Anyone who has served in the Forces can be a member,but as there has not been a major war for sometime, membership has been extended.The Poppy Appeal and Remembrance Day are the highlights of the year.There is always a large church parade with Shaftesbury Silver Band. The Legion Club has an old hut that has been converted by its members into a clubroom.Here Bingo is played every Tuesday.The Club has a bar with a Pool table and table skittles.It also runs a darts team. JUDO is held every Monday for boys and girls at St. Mary's RC School.It is very well attended.Children work to gain belts of different colours which signify progress.
